mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ic_product (pro_name, pro_price, pro_img, pro_content, pro_kind) VALUES (#{pro_name}, #{pro_price}, #{pro_img}, #{pro_content},"과자")
INSERT INTO ic_product (pro_name, pro_price, pro_img, pro_content, pro_kind) VALUES (#{pro_name}, #{pro_price}, #{pro_img}, #{pro_content},"건강기능")
